item.title: Overwatch Player Aggregated Stats
item.description: In my free time I spend much of my time playing Overwatch or trying to learn the game. I really enjoy the game and looked into how I could get some stats to find improvements in my game and maybe others as well. There are and were a few problems that I encountered when doing some research on this topic.
